episodes.title: Episode 1: MCP Fundamentals
episodes.description: Deep dive into Model Context Protocol architecture, security patterns, and why it matters for agentic AI.
episodes.author: Wykeve Freeman

episodes.title: Episode 2: OAuth 2.1 for MCP Servers
episodes.description: Security implementation patterns. How to secure your MCP server with OAuth 2.1 + RFC 8707 resource indicators.
episodes.author: Wykeve Freeman

episodes.title: Episode 3: Zero-Cost Crypto Trading Bot with LLM
episodes.description: Build an automated crypto trading bot using Freqtrade and LLM-powered AI co-processors. Complete blueprint from setup to deployment.
episodes.author: Wykeve Freeman
